Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Some Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are operating with residual delays after earlier police activity at Irving Park. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Some Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are operating with residual delays after earlier police activity at Irving Park.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
